TopicTitle: Be able to adjust power/brightness levels on ights

Articles.Content: I was thinking today, you should be able to adjust the power/brightness levels on lights. I was looking around on my space station today and noticed that the lights were a bit too bright giving them an unnatural colour. If lights were adjustable, power consumption could also be reduced in cases where you only need enough light to be able to see where your ship is. Feedback would be nice

I can dig it. Or perhaps keep the lights we have now but add adjustable lights. Maybe they can be some kind of ridiculous LED light where you can adjust the brightness and maybe color as well

Would be a good mod if it never makes it into the vanilla game~

I was looking around on my space station today and noticed that the lights were a bit too bright giving them an unnatural colour.

Have you tried increasing pixel light count? My space station also looks overexposed, unless I set the pixel light count to a number greater than 30 (likely depends on the number of illuminators on the station).

I doubt that in this case an adjustment of the brightness level would help much.

I think this is a nice idea, a slider on right click menus for indevidual lights and if you right click or mouse over the lights butten at top, a slider will apear, to change brightness of lights on the whole spacecraft.

Oh yes, a right click slider for intensity would solve all my problems!

thumbs up from me for that one!
